item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: The road to learning physics meanders. Here’s some literature to help on the way. Mechanics Goldstein Quantum Mechanics Griffiths Shankar Statistical Mechanics Kittel- Basics and no more Electromagnetism Griffiths Jackson Condensed Matter Kittel Ashcroft and Mermin Girvin Quantum Field Theory Blundell
